thread.title: Plaid Cymru say it's time for free care for the elderly but who pays?
thread.title_full: Plaid Cymru say it's time for free care for the elderly but who pays? | Wales - ITV News

author: Rob Osborne
title: Plaid Cymru say it's time for free care for the elderly but who pays?
text:
If you get a cancer diagnosis then the state would pay for the treatment. If you get dementia then you'll be paying thousands of pounds for social care. Plaid Cymru say that isn't right and the time has come to give free social care to the elderly (over 65) and those with dementia.
It's a policy that will grab the headlines, but it will cost millions. I've been asking Plaid's Health spokeswoman Elin Jones where the cash is coming from
Play video Last updated Thu 8 Oct 2015 Read more 3 updates Abolish charges for elderly care says Plaid Cymru Politics Plaid Cymru Wales
